author: Megan Armstrong
title: Buccaneers Owners Pledge $100K Toward St. Petersburg Coronavirus Relief Fund
description: The Glazer family, owners of the  Tampa Bay Buccaneers , will donate $100,000 to St. Petersburg through the Fighting Chance Fund to aid with the COVID-19 crisis, according to  Carmen Vitali  of the Bucs' official website...
content: The Glazer family, owners of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, will donate $100,000 to St. Petersburg through the Fighting Chance Fund to aid with the COVID-19 crisis, according to Carmen Vitali of the Bucs' official website."The City of St. Petersburg has become kno… [+1013 chars]
